description: A nod to paniolo (cowboy) and ranching culture found in island upcountry, this sandal is a dapper addition to any out?t. Made with high-character, full-grain leather, and embroidery inspired by the stitching on Hawaiian saddles, you’ll feel the workmanship in every step. Made for the beach, not the ocean—prolonged contact with water may cause damage.
name: Olukai Mekila - Mens

specs.value: High-character, full-grain leather with a soft microﬁber lining creates step-in comfort. Featuring an embroidered logo with a hand-sewn leather toe post for added style
The compression-molded EVA midsole wrapped in deeply oiled leather and anatomically correct contour deliver a customized fit and all-day support
Full-grain, leather wrapped outsole with non-marking rubber traction pods for enhanced grip and flexibility
